subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|かげ}}

# [[shadow]], [[shade]]
#: 木の'''陰'''
#: a '''shadow''' of a tree
# [[hidden]] [[side]]
#: '''陰'''で動き回る
#:: maneuver in a '''hidden side'''
#: '''陰の'''支配者
#:: a '''hidden''' ruler

subSections.title: Affix
subSections.text:
{{ja-pos|affix|いん}}

# [[shade]]; [[shadow]]
# [[shadow]] of the [[sun]]; {{lb|ja|figuratively}} [[time]]
# [[secret]]; [[unknown]]
# [[genitalia]]
# [[negative]]; “[[female]]”; [[quiescent]]; [[minus]]
# {{lb|ja|philosophy}} [[yin]]
# [[north]] [[side]] of [[mountain]]; [[south]] side of [[water]]
# the [[moon]]

subSections.title: Etymology 3
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|ほと|yomi=k}}
/hoto<sub>2</sub>/: *[potə] → [ɸoto] → [hoto]. As indicated in the ''[[w:Wamyō Ruijushō|Wamyōshō]]'' citation, /to<sub>2</sub>/ may be related to {{m|ja|処||tr=/to<sub>1</sub>/|place, location}}, but the phonological difference can not be explained. Perhaps related to Korean {{m|ko|보지||tr=poji|vagina}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|ほと}}

# [[female]] [[genitalia]]
#* '''712''', [[w:Kojiki|Kojiki]]
#*: 因生此子、美'''蕃登'''<small>此三字以音。</small>見灸而病臥在。
#* '''712''', [[w:Kojiki|Kojiki]]
#*: 逆剥天斑馬剥而、所墮入時、天服織女見驚而、於梭衝'''陰上'''而死。<small>訓陰上云'''富登'''。</small>
# {{lb|sort=ほと|ja|by extension}} [[male]] [[genitalia]]
#* {{RQ:Wamyō Ruijushō|2|44-45}}
#*: 陰 釋名云、陰、今案玉茎玉門等通稱也 [...] 原書無其字按神代紀、「陰訓'''保止'''、保是含包之言、即所謂在陰翳之義、止、處也」 [...]
